DOC.brief_title: Health Promotion Young Adults With High Risk Disability Mental Health
DOC.detailed_description: Early finding people high mental risk play important role mental health promotion . In literature , specific psychotic symptom appear , individual may experience period nonspecific symptom grow functional impairment . Early intervention may alter natural course mental diseases improve treatment outcome . So , purpose study develop screen prevention mode identify young adult high risk status mental health disability . The psychosocial intervention strategy emotional cognitive support prevention model base health promotion theory use study . Participants experimental design study randomly assign experimental control group . Four scale objective physical assessment use evaluate study outcome . The pre- post-test hold one week prevention intervention . In addition , follow-up include understanding long-term outcome effectiveness screen prevention model .
